snippet: At the Basilica Soundscape festival, a growing event, the atmosphere competed with the music.
abstract: Ben Ratliff submits that Basilica Soundscape festival, sold-out event held in old train-wheel factory in Hudson, NY, differs from other music festivals in that it evokes feeling that music is living organism.
lead_paragraph: At the Basilica Soundscape festival, a growing event, the atmosphere competed with the music.

headline.print_headline: Music Emanating From a Factory Is Hardly Machine-Made
headline.seo: The Basilica Soundscape Festival Features an Eclectic Lineup
headline.main: Music Emanating From a Factory Is Hardly Machine-Made
